backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining products, inventory, sales, users, cash transactions, and authorization with storage mixins and various CRUD/state types.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two frontend feature requirements tied to ProductFormModal updates with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of major frontend files including pages, hooks, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variable definitions providing OKLCH color tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React shell managing views, providing QueryClient, rendering pages, navbar, and footer with attribution.
frontend/src/components/AdjustStockModal: Modal for adding or reducing inventory stock with validation, error normalization, and backend mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard displaying sales summary, payment totals, low‑stock detection with auto dialog, and error/auth handling.
frontend/src/components/EditInventoryIte: Modal for editing an inventory item, handling validation, duplicate checks, and update mutations.
frontend/src/components/EditSaleModal.ts: Modal for editing a sale record, allowing item modifications, validation, and submitting updated sale data.
frontend/src/components/InventoryFormMod: Form modal for adding new inventory items with duplicate checks, stock calculations, and input validation.
frontend/src/components/InventoryPage.ts: Main inventory management page showing stock list, handling modals, error states, and low‑stock logic.
frontend/src/components/InventoryReportP: Displays inventory adjustment history with error handling and a sortable report list.
frontend/src/components/LowStockWarningD: Dialog showing items that have reached or fallen below minimum stock levels.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Renders the main navigation bar with menu items, including a dropdown for report views, and triggers view changes.
frontend/src/components/ProductFormModal: Provides a modal form to add products, handling image upload, validation, and backend submission.
frontend/src/components/ProductsPage.tsx: Displays the product catalog with loading and error states, and includes controls to add products and navigate back.
frontend/src/components/QuantityPromptMo: Prompts the user to enter a quantity for a selected product and shows price calculations before confirming.
Shows a styled error message with retry functionality based on normalized error details.
Displays sales report data with date filtering, editing/deleting sales, and export-to-XLS features.
frontend/src/components/SignInRequiredSt: Shows a sign‑in prompt for Internet Identity when authentication is required to access content.
Implements a two-step cart and payment flow, allowing product selection, quantity input, cart management, and sale submission. Integrates product data, identity, and sale recording via hooks.
frontend/src/constants/productOptions.ts: Defines constant lists of product categories, sizes, and names along with associated TypeScript types. Used for product creation and stock rule configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates an authenticated or anonymous backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on identity change. Provides global access to the active actor instance.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerRole.ts: Fetches the caller’s backend-defined user role with safe fallbacks and warns against using it for any UI access control. Always returns a non-breaking 'user' default role.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardSummary.t: Fetches dashboard summary data from the backend using the authenticated actor. Enabled once the actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login flow, stored identities, and provides identity context to the app. Wraps Dfinity AuthClient with custom initialization logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInvalidateActorQue: Provides a helper to invalidate all queries related to the backend actor. Used to force-refresh actor-dependent queries after failures.
frontend/src/hooks/useInventory.ts: Fetches inventory items and provides mutations for adding, updating, and adjusting stock. Invalidates inventory queries after successful mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInventoryReport.ts: Retrieves inventory history reports using a public actor with optional filtering and time-range parameters. Refetches automatically when parameters change.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Fetches product list and provides a mutation for adding new products. Invalidates the products query on successful creation.
frontend/src/hooks/usePublicActor.ts: Creates and manages an anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries when it changes. Used for public, unauthenticated data access.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecordSale.ts: Provides a mutation to record new sales with items and payment method. Invalidates dashboard and inventory queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSalesMutations.ts: Provides mutations for updating and deleting sales, invalidating sales report and dashboard queries after success. Uses the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSalesReport.ts: Fetches sales records for a given timestamp range using the authenticated actor. Supports reactive refetch via query keys.
frontend/src/hooks/useStockDeductionRule: File exists but contains no implementation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/errorMessage.ts: Normalizes various backend error messages into user‑friendly titles and flags auth errors.
frontend/src/utils/exportToXls.ts: Generates an HTML-based Excel file from sales line items and triggers a download.
frontend/src/utils/inventoryName.ts: Provides helpers to normalize inventory item names and detect duplicates.
frontend/src/utils/salesFormat.ts: Formats currency, dates, and payment method labels for sales data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Manages URL and sessionStorage parameters with helpers for extracting, persisting, and clearing values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, features, and pending requests for the Product Catalog app.
